channel.title: [deltabased 317] ::jail Command Help
channel.description: ok, i need help with the ::jail command...atm it works 100% and you can also ::unjail someone...but when the person is in jail if another player is nearby the prisoner can escape by pressing follow...ik this has something to do with clipping, but all i want to know is how to make it so that person can not move...it is a jail cell but still they can move around by following...so id like to know how to make them not be able to do that, then they r in jail until i say they arnt anymore :D also, i just recoded this command and it makes them unable to logout when in jail :D

item.title: [deltabased 317] ::jail Command Help
item.dc:creator: @RoidScape.Darkbb RoidScape.Darkbb
item.description:
@RoidScape.Darkbb wrote:

dastan…the jail is currently in the staff zone lol…no players will go near it…i just need to make sure 100%…and…yes the INTS are impossibly hard…i do have a clipping system…it works quite well

as for the last guy. i do have a suspicious activity system i guess it just doesnt work to its full extent…and for the guy who said create a retele command…i guess this would work 100% id use it except i would have no idea how to code this

Edit: i lied as far as the staff zone goes…currently the jail is located near the home…kinda far though and hidden by trees…

Read full topic

item.title: [deltabased 317] ::jail Command Help
item.dc:creator: @dillktm65 dillktm65
item.description:
@dillktm65 wrote:

Why Not Just add Sospious Activity? On Any Click?

item.title: [deltabased 317] ::jail Command Help
item.dc:creator: @rova1 rova1
item.description:
@rova1 wrote:

There is also a way you can make it so a jailed player automatically gets teleported back inside jail if they leave (unless unjail command is used or they served their sentance)

Read full topic

item.title: [deltabased 317] ::jail Command Help
item.dc:creator: @iTz_Karma iTz Karma
item.description:
@iTz_Karma wrote:

He’s saying to make them teleport to somewhere you can’t reach by teleporting or walking. [PUT THE JAIL SOMEWHERE ELSE] The ints are far too complicated to get into, you’d have to fix your entire noclipping problem. I’m sure there’s a tut somewhere here

Read full topic

item.title: [deltabased 317] ::jail Command Help
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Read closely.

Make the ::jail command teleport so far away , that no other spell teleport in your spellbook , could not reach it. So that no friends could find him. Get it?

Read full topic

item.title: [deltabased 317] ::jail Command Help
item.dc:creator: @RoidScape.Darkbb RoidScape.Darkbb
item.description:
@RoidScape.Darkbb wrote:

dastan! they already teleport ! and they can not teleport out! i have coded that part the only thing i was asking is how to get rid of the follow interface…and mike…give me creds if i help you?

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @mikeownyou mikeownyou
item.description:

OMFG i was never going to add a ::Jail to my server but thanks somehow i need to find out how to lol

item.title: [deltabased 317] ::jail Command Help
item.dc:creator: @Dastan1 Dastan_
item.description:
@Dastan1 wrote:

Just make it teleport you somewhere , where your spellbook teleports cannot reach.

Read full topic

item.title: [deltabased 317] ::jail Command Help
item.dc:creator: @RoidScape.Darkbb RoidScape.Darkbb
item.description:
@RoidScape.Darkbb wrote:

… “do you think im a downer?” - #Haste

of course it teleports the person injail to a jail cell…otherwise it wouldnt do much…i need to make it so that they can not follow…like the follow interface button is gone…im sure this is difficult but im willing to do it.

Read full topic
